task.title: How to multiply numbers
task.shortdesc: Here you will find instructions for the multiplication feature of CohnCalc.

prereq.p: To successfully multiply numbers, you must know what is multiplication.

result.p: The result from the multiplication is displayed.

example.p: You want to multiply 3 and 2. The equation will look like: 3x2=6. You enter 3. Press multiply (x). Enter 2. Press equals.
The result 6 appears on the screen.
